entry.sentence: Count Harro and his young , beautiful wife lived so happily together that Griseldis said to her husband , `` I could be afraid of the greatness of my happiness , my Harro ! ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NNP Count) (NNP Harro)) (CC and) (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ young) (, ,) (JJ beautiful) (NN wife))) (VP (VBD lived) (SBAR (IN so) (S (S (ADVP (RB happily)) (ADVP (RB together)) (NP (DT that) (NNPS Griseldis)) (VP (VBD said) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN husband))))) (, ,) (`` ``) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD could) (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ afraid) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN greatness)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN happiness)) (, ,) (NP (PRP$ my) (NNP Harro))))))))))))) (. !) ('' '')))
entry.deps: nn(Harro-2, Count-1) nsubj(lived-9, Harro-2) poss(wife-8, his-4) amod(wife-8, young-5) amod(wife-8, beautiful-7) conj_and(Harro-2, wife-8) nsubj(lived-9, wife-8) root(ROOT-0, lived-9) mark(said-15, so-10) advmod(said-15, happily-11) advmod(said-15, together-12) det(Griseldis-14, that-13) nsubj(said-15, Griseldis-14) advcl(lived-9, said-15) poss(husband-18, her-17) prep_to(said-15, husband-18) nsubj(afraid-24, I-21) aux(afraid-24, could-22) cop(afraid-24, be-23) parataxis(said-15, afraid-24) det(greatness-27, the-26) prep_of(afraid-24, greatness-27) poss(happiness-30, my-29) prep_of(greatness-27, happiness-30) poss(Harro-33, my-32) appos(happiness-30, Harro-33)

entry.sentence: Then he pulled her tightly to him and looked deep into her sunny eyes .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (RB Then) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VP (VBD pulled) (S (NP (PRP her)) (ADJP (RB tightly) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP him)))))) (CC and) (VP (VBD looked) (ADVP (RB deep)) (PP (IN into) (NP (PRP$ her) (JJ sunny) (NNS eyes))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: advmod(pulled-3, Then-1) nsubj(pulled-3, he-2) nsubj(looked-9, he-2) root(ROOT-0, pulled-3) nsubj(tightly-5, her-4) xcomp(pulled-3, tightly-5) prep_to(tightly-5, him-7) conj_and(pulled-3, looked-9) advmod(looked-9, deep-10) poss(eyes-14, her-12) amod(eyes-14, sunny-13) prep_into(looked-9, eyes-14)
